skill_e.tooltip:
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing 40/75/110/145/180 (+0.3) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by 30/35/40/45/50% for 1.5 seconds.

Enemies triggering a mine take 40% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after 10 seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

skill_q.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals 85/130/175/220/265 (+0.65) magic damage.

skill_r.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take 300/450/600 (+1.1) magic damage. Enemies farther away take 200/300/400 (+0.7333) magic damage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.5) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will hexplode structurally unsound towers below ?% of their Health.
